12static void gui_string_draw(Canvas* canvas, WidgetElement* element) {

14 furi_assert(element);

29static void gui_string_free(WidgetElement* gui_string) {
30 furi_assert(gui_string);
31
32 GuiStringModel* model = gui_string->model;
33 furi_string_free(model->text);

38WidgetElement* widget_element_string_create(
39 uint8_t x,
40 uint8_t y,
41 Align horizontal,
42 Align vertical,
43 Font font,
44 const char* text) {
45 furi_assert(text);
46
47 // Allocate and init model
48 GuiStringModel* model = malloc(sizeof(GuiStringModel));
49 model->x = x;
50 model->y = y;
51 model->horizontal = horizontal;
52 model->vertical = vertical;
53 model->font = font;
54 model->text = furi_string_alloc_set(text);
55
56 // Allocate and init Element
57 WidgetElement* gui_string = malloc(sizeof(WidgetElement));
58 gui_string->parent = NULL;
59 gui_string->input = NULL;
60 gui_string->draw = gui_string_draw;
61 gui_string->free = gui_string_free;
62 gui_string->model = model;
63
64 return gui_string;
65} //-V773
